blocks.name: cgzf
blocks.content: The set of models of ZF.

blocks.name: df-gzext
blocks.content: The Godel-set version of the Axiom of Extensionality. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)

blocks.name: df-gzrep
blocks.content: The Godel-set version of the Axiom Scheme of Replacement. Since this is a scheme and not a single axiom, it manifests as a function on wffs, each giving rise to a different axiom. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)

blocks.name: df-gzpow
blocks.content: The Godel-set version of the Axiom of Power Sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)

blocks.name: df-gzun
blocks.content: The Godel-set version of the Axiom of Unions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)

blocks.name: df-gzreg
blocks.content: The Godel-set version of the Axiom of Regularity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)

blocks.name: df-gzinf
blocks.content: The Godel-set version of the Axiom of Infinity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)

blocks.name: df-gzf
blocks.content: Define the class of all (transitive) models of ZF. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)
